title: 08/09: Tight Ends Preview (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Draft a Top 3 guy, pick from the mid-round group or just keep waiting? Which strategy are we most likely to use this year? It certainly seems like a good year to draft an elite TE. We cover our general TE thoughts (9:25) and give some auction values (19:50) as we weigh the TE decisions that Fantasy owners will have to make during drafts ... Sleepers (24:00), breakouts (27:50), busts (30:20) and an in-depth debate about Evan Engram vs. Kyle Rudolph (32:00) ... A thorough ADP review (39:40) as we discuss if any of the Top 3 TEs could be busts, if the mid-round guys are too risky for their ADPs, drafting safety vs. drafting upside, Eric Ebron's outlook, deep sleepers and so much more ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
